item.title: Buoyancy-Regulating Robot
item.description: A robot used to locate liquid-liquid interfaces by regulating the robots volume and embedded electromechanical actuation.

item.title: Crane game machine
item.description: A crane game machine built for the How To Make Almost Anything Course.

item.title: Danmarkskort
item.description: A project to create a google maps clone with KD trees and A*

item.title: Deathrolling in WASM
item.description: A webassembly implementation of a gambling game found in WoW.

item.title: Parallax Occlusion mapping
item.description: A project to implement parallax occlusion mapping in OpenGL

item.title: Evolutionary hide and Seek
item.description: A project where two adverserial groups were taught to hide and seek through reinforcement and evolutionary learning.

item.title: Homemade IOT Smarthome
item.description: A project where i explore IOT and Smart home technologies to automate my home.

item.title: Kattis problems
item.description: A collection of solutions for the programming problems on Kattis

item.title: MemeApi - C# backend
item.description: An api for generating random memes based on components from user submitted memes.

item.title: Memebot discord bot
item.description: A python implementation of a discord bot for interacting with the memesite API

item.title: Memesite - Meme generator
item.description: A website for generating random memes based on components from user submitted memes.

item.title: Pressure sensing robot
item.description: A project where we use load cells to detect objects on a mesh and to move these objects by manipulating tension in the mesh.

item.title: ScrabbleBot
item.description: A project about using functional programming to implement a Scrabble Bot.
